text: The 1924 Tour of the Basque Country was the inaugural edition of the Tour of the Basque Country cycle race and was held from 7 August to 10 August 1924. The race started and finished in Bilbao. The race was won by Francis Pélissier. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 11" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 21' 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 22' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 24' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 26' 41" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 41' 15" |} |} ==References== 1924 Bas
title: 1924 Tour of the Basque Country
